body_html: @suharshs Anyway to resolve this error? I'm attempting to add quantization nodes into a loaded pre-trained keras model (based on Mobilenet) and I get this very same error. Keras seems to handle batch norm differently than TensorFlow, and thus the moving_variance_tensor and moving_mean_tensor are None and this error occurs.
body_text: @suharshs Anyway to resolve this error? I'm attempting to add quantization nodes into a loaded pre-trained keras model (based on Mobilenet) and I get this very same error. Keras seems to handle batch norm differently than TensorFlow, and thus the moving_variance_tensor and moving_mean_tensor are None and this error occurs.
body: @suharshs Anyway to resolve this error? I'm attempting to add quantization nodes into a loaded pre-trained keras model (based on Mobilenet) and I get this very same error. Keras seems to handle batch norm differently than TensorFlow, and thus the `moving_variance_tensor` and `moving_mean_tensor` are `None` and this error occurs.
